title: GMFB: Coming out of retirement?
itunes:title: GMFB: Coming out of retirement?
description:
On the #GMFB Podcast: The team discussed how they spent their time off (:28); Kyle tells the story of his triumphant return to Chicago (3:38); Could Marshawn Lynch come out of retirement? (7:30); Nate says he could still play in the league (11:46); The team recounts the tale of Tom Brady’s now recovered jersey (15:23); What is Colin Kaepernick’s future in the league? (23:27); and finally, what would a move to Las Vegas be like for the Raiders and the league? (36:57)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
